title: No premium shall be charged for fungible compensatory area and features permitted free of FSI as per Regulation No 31 for the development for AH/R&R tenements
clause_text: No premium shall be charged for fungible compensatory area and features permitted free of FSI as per Regulation No 31 for the development for AH/R&R tenements. However, payments of the premium shall be applicable on the owners share wherever required.
section: Development of AH/R&Ron private plot or plot of authority other than Govt./MCGM/Appropriate Authority.
